example.eg: When I grow up, I want to be an author.
example.egtrans: 我长大后想成为一名作家。

example.eg: The author of the book was famous, but nobody recognized him.
example.egtrans: 这本书的作者很有名，但没有人认出他来。

example.eg: She authored two of the magazine articles.
example.egtrans: 她撰写了两篇杂志文章。

example.eg: He is the author of all his problems.
He has authored all his own problems.
example.egtrans: 他造就了自身的所有问题。

example.eg: Tim's coauthor is one of his university colleagues.
The two professors co-authored a paper on global warming.

dsense.name: coauthor [sth] with [sb], also UK: co-author [sth] with [sb]⇒

example.eg: Caroline coauthored the book with her husband.
